definition: to meet/to rendezvous/to merge/to link up/meeting/confluence
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Finally he specified the particular time togather.
sentences.chinese: 最後他指定會合的特定時間。

sentences.english: The middle stretch of the Yangtze is a natural transportation and communications nexus.
sentences.chinese: 該地區位於長江中游，是天然的運輸與通訊會合點。

sentences.english: Junruo concubine Yang road dust, if the turbidity cement, floating and sinking of different potential, when harmonic meet?
sentences.chinese: 君若揚路塵，妾若濁水泥，浮沈各異勢，會合何時諧？

sentences.english: A stalagmite is below a stalactite and they both grow, eventually to meet.
sentences.chinese: 石筍在鐘乳石下面，它們二者都在增長，最終會合。

sentences.english: The road goes around in a loop and rejoins the main road about 2 kilometers past the town.
sentences.chinese: 這條路呈環狀，在城外兩公里處與幹道會合。

sentences.english: Eligible Transactions made by the Principal and Supplementary Cardholders of the same Applicable Credit Card Account will be counted collectively.
sentences.chinese: 適用信用卡主卡及附屬卡之籤賬將會合並計算。

sentences.english: B: Well, we need to meet first, then catch a taxi to the airport.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我們需要先會合，然後乘出租車去機場。

sentences.english: Ross and Rachel have to work, so they plan to come a day later.
sentences.chinese: 羅斯和瑞秋因工作安排而決定遲一天飛去會合。

sentences.english: The four Pevensie children meet Prince Caspian.
sentences.chinese: 帕文西四兄妹與凱斯賓王子會合。

sentences.english: The lane and the main road join here.
Sounds good, I'll meet you back here after I go through the line.
sentences.chinese: 聽起來不錯，我排完隊後再到這兒來與你們會合。

sentences.english: A vanishing point. The illusion of convergence.
sentences.chinese: 那相交點正在消失，是對會合的幻覺。

sentences.english: We plan to join up with the other team at the top of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我們計劃與另外一個隊在山頂會合。

sentences.english: I meet up with another writer and we wend our way through downtown.
sentences.chinese: 我與另一位作家會合，慢慢蜿蜒穿過市中心。

sentences.english: What time is best to meet tomorrow?
Despite being surrounded by orcs, Sam and his master are reunited .
sentences.chinese: 儘管被半獸人重重包圍，山姆和他的主人還是會合了。

definition: Huitong county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan

to go on a journey/to leave
